content.label:
While I could play it :( with the new update my old phone can no longer play this game and the version I have just covers the screen with UPDATE that I can't update to :(

For those that want a faster way to progress if you turn on airplane mode go back a few days start game up then you can use all your abilities wait until they expire, set the clock forward an hour and rinse and repeat. Got to
Floor 750 with this method :P still end up crawling after a point though.

The best item in the game in my opinion is that hat that can give you a quest at tower reset. The quest can give gems and chests so I just do the first 100 floors and reset until I get a quest then go as far as I can in the time limit which is between 7-13 mins I usually get around floor 350~ btw do not use the time skip thing for abilities during quest or you will end the quest instantly.

Fire swords may seem pointless at +10 atk but when you have +500k% atk +285k% atk and +80k% atk like I do that +10 atk becomes thousands of bonus attack and definitely helps in getting those quest done faster.

Fairies were pointless when I played dunno if update have them any worth.

If your stuck on a floor or progress is halting reset dungeon no point in lingering for hours to clear a floor when you can quickly clear up to that point and get chests along the way!
It's a good game.
I love it!! üëåüëç

content.label: Make it to where we can gain equipment easier instead of RNG
Best game ever I love it
I've quite enjoyed my time playing the game and will continue to play and tell my friends for weeks to come.

title.label: So fun but could use more content.

content.label:
I started playing to kill time and it does the job very well, aswell as the game doesn't kill the battery very fast. More purchase items, heros, and lastly more ways to get stronger after resets since gear only does so much.
I don't mean to be critical because the game is still very, very fun, but it could be made better and I look forward to what comes next as it gets updates.
In a good way. I play this game whenever I get bored and need something to occupy me for 30 minutes to an hour.
It is so easy to get leveled up on this game and when you're not playing in owned you money without you playing at all

One of my favorite idlers! Simple and whimsical. Really well done.

2 things I'd like to see though. First, way to automate the Hero summoning. Either fully automated or at least a press and hold variation. Second would be moving the "watch an ad for crystals" cloud farther away from the tower. But those are just nit picky items.

The grind is fun. Items are permanent.
The ads aren't too invasive.

Simple, yet addicting, 
the game is quite akin to popcorn.

That being said anygame that You can play off and on for a year deserves praise, especially given how often they turn out to be money making schemes. This is one of those games that you cannot buy to win unless you're obscenely rich.

title.label: It's a great idler, as long as you don't let it idle

content.label: I really enjoy this idler, the only problem is you can't really let it idle. If you close the game or put your phone to sleep your earning drops to about 0.1% of what it would be if you still had the game open.  The developer should also consider changing the flame sword item.  Because it isn't percentage based it's really only useful for the first 20 floors or so.  Not very good considering it's the only IAP.  Changing this would likely provide a better incentive to buy IAPs.

This is a great game overall that can keep you entertained even if you not in the mood. It has a self farming system and manual, and is overall interactive. If you have time to waste this is a game to do it with!

Not really as bad as I thought it would be. I've been playing it for about 2 weeks now and so far no bug or glitches. Also there's enough to keep u busy to make it more addicting than tap Titan. Also the gold upgrade amounts are spaced out enough to not make things have a ridiculous cost unless you try and speed run it at all. Which would be stupid anyways.
Perfect pick up and play game.
I love this game because it's a good time waster and you don't hit a wall in your progress, your steadily getting better. I like that.

Love the game, simple yet addicting. Keeps me wanting to to find that next chest. I've seen a few games with similar concepts of starting over a game but with benefits to try to get further. So far though none of them have had animations to them. Overall I enjoy the game.
It's so addicting!!! I love it
I keep coming back. This really is a great idler.
fun gane
One of the best idlers out there, hope it gets continued support and updates frequently!
Truly a front page worthy game.
This game is perfect if you are looking for an incremental game where u slowly get stronger i would personally recommend everybody try it
